text: Hi
hello
How's it going
it's going good so far this morning for me.  what about you?
Another day in paradise
haha. do you live in the states ?
Great state of Texas. How about you?
chicago.  so what is this about anyway? it says a child's charity. I am lost.
I guess I'm supposed to persuade you to donate your bonus to the save the children charity.....I want you to keep your bonus obviously
it would help to know what childrens charity as well with some information about it.  usually thats how you persuade ppl to donate. show a pic of a kid etc.
How much do you like to donate to the charity now? Your donation will be directly deducted from your task payment. You can choose any amount from $0 to all your payment
I do not wish to donate.  I've been given no info about the charity.
They help children in warzones and other poor nations to get food and clothes
oh ok, who is they? what is the organization ?
Save The Children is the name
no, I do not wish to donate at this time.  there are other charities I'd like to donate to over this one. I'm sorry.  I don't have a lot to work with either.
Think of the poor kids in Syria who could get so much for the price of a coffee in Chicago. Do you really need all you have when they have nothing at all?
I don't have much money for myself either which is why I consider this to be my part time job. I already work full-time to make ends meet. I'm sorry

But you have a full time job, food, shelter and I'm sure you have family and friends. These kids families were murdered and they live in rubble that used to be their home, nobody to care for them and they only eat what they can find off the street from the dead. If they eat at all
that is very sad.  I'd like to look into this charity more before I donate as well.  I'd like to see how the money is dispersed in the company
